channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Matrix Project Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Matrix Project Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-20615|2024-08-03T02:17:52.951Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20matrix%20project%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Matrix Project Plugin 1.19 and earlier does not escape HTML metacharacters in node and label names, and label descriptions, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Agent/Configure permission.
